 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעַב‎</span>] **verb** ==jest== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***id.***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְעַב‎</span> Ethpa\`al ***id.***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethpa\`al ***mock, delight oneself, be greedy***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***play, sport, jest***); — only **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּהְיוּ מַלְעִבִים בְּ‎</span> [[2Chr.36.16|2Chr 36:16]] ***and they were*** (continually) ***making jest at*** the messengers of God.
